entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
